TopicTitle: Kerbals: From the Ground to the Stars

Articles.Content:
Hi there! SpaceplaneAddict here, but for all intents and purposes on YouTube, I'm BlazeStudios. I share a channel with my friend, RiotShield. Yes, @PilotsofRiots, don't be shy, you've been revealed. Anyway, I kinda have been wanting to make a KSP career series with commentary for a while, so here it is!

So yeah, it's basically me in a basic career, while having to buy everything I research. Very basic, but there might be some story coming in later....... .

And sorry for such a long episode, I kinda got carried away with that last mission. And even thougbh I said it in the video, the final goal is not Jool-5, it's something, much, much worse.....

 

-SpaceplaneAddict, AKA BlazeStudios

     Stay Determined . . .

Is it a mega Dres base? 

GO SPACEPLANEADDICT!!! 

And as you say, Determination.

Thanks Max, but I'm kinda disappointed as there being no feedback, not even a comment. Was the video too long? Did I ramble? Am I just overshadowed by other popular forum-goers?

I'll
Stay Determined . . .

No, it's great. In my opinion 30 min is kinda on the long side, but I suppose that's just because most videos I watch are either made faster or edited so it's a bunch of clips. It's still fine though, because that's expected of starting career mode. And I didn't watch with sound because it's 10 PM here. Basically, I love it, it's fine, just I should pay more attention. Your great.
